item.title: The B8S 4K OLED TV has been launched by LG Electronics
item.description: LG’s New B8S 4K OLED TV Offers High-End Features at an Accessible Price LG Electronics, a top OLED TV brand, is strengthening its market position with the new LG B8S 4K OLED TV. This Korean-made TV joins the 2018 4K OLED lineup, boasting impressive features like the α (Alpha) 7 processor, 4K Cinema HDR, and LG’s ThinQ Artificial Intelligence (AI). The α7 processor delivers lifelike images characterized by rich colors, sharp details, and impressive depth, enhancing realism.

item.title: The Coming Low Power Revolution
item.description: A significant societal shift is underway, centered around a decrease, rather than an increase, in power. This revolution is driven by the need to reduce energy consumption, a stark contrast to the relentless push for productivity fueled by technology. Our reliance on technology for increased productivity has come at a cost: heightened energy consumption. From constantly connected devices to energy-hungry data centers, our appetite for instant information and communication demands a continuous energy supply.
